main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted in Central New Jersey on August 8, 1958.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes., The object was reported to be silver in color and shaped like twisted wire., The object exhibited a velocity of 1200 mph and traveled from east to west at an altitude of approximately 3,000 ft., Witnesses observed the object moving at fantastic speeds, curving with the terrain., No photographs were included in the report, only handwritten documents and sketches.
sighted object: a silver object shaped like twisted wire
